name: Text WarZ
description:
Can Type Fast ? Play this game and defeat enemy`s vehicle using your typing skills.

Instructions :

You would find a Text box at the bottom of the screen. You just have to type " Shoot " to shoot a missile and destroy enemy`s Vehicles but be CAREFUL !! , If you click anywhere else you may lost focus on the text box and it may cause trouble. And Yes , There would be a barricade in front of your Green Tank which can safe you but only thrice and once the enemy vehicle touched you , you would loose . THAT`s IT.
